channel.title: Voo on Archive 03
channel.description: Recent content in Voo on Archive 03

item.title: VTI vs. VOO: Which Vanguard ETF Is Right for You?
item.description: It’s the timeless debate for US stock investors: VTI vs. VOO. Kurumi argues for VTI’s ability to capture future growth by buying the ’total market,’ while Mikael contends that VOO’s focus on 500 proven winners is more efficient. We break down the subtle philosophical differences and nearly identical performance data to help you choose.

item.title: The Case for S&P 500 ETFs for Beginners
item.description: Feeling lost about where to start with investing? Even Warren Buffett recommends S&P 500 ETFs. From the true meaning of ‘buy the market’ to the risks of high valuations, three unique characters will explain the fundamentals of investing in a clear and simple way.
